title: State clears LAPD officers in the fatal shooting of man on Hollywood Boulevard
dc:creator: Libor Jany
description: California Atty. Gen. Rob Bonta's office has cleared two LAPD officers of criminal wrongdoing in the July 2021 fatal shooting of a 53-year-old man, the office said Thursday.
content:encoded: California Atty. Gen. Rob Bonta's office has cleared two LAPD officers of criminal wrongdoing in the July 2021 fatal shooting of a 53-year-old man, the office said Thursday.

media:content.media:description: LAPD officers shoot a man on Hollywood Boulevard in July after he raised a butane lighter with a pistol-like grip in their direction.
